metadata.title: Excess cases of Influenza like illnesses in France synchronous with COVID19 invasion. Pierre-Yves BoÃ«lle 1 and the Sentinelles syndromic and viral surveillance group

abstract.original_text: Several French regions where COVID19 has been reported currently show a renewed increase in ILI cases in the general practice based Sentinelles network. Here we computed the number of excess cases by region and found correlation with the number of reported COVID19 cases so far. These data suggest larger circulation of SARS-CoV-2 in the French population than apparent from confirmed cases.

sentences.segment_text: Several French regions where COVID19 has been reported currently show a renewed increase in ILI cases in the general practice based Sentinelles network .
Here we computed the number of excess cases by region and found correlation with the number of reported COVID19 cases so far .
These data suggest larger circulation of SARS-CoV-2 in the French population than apparent from confirmed cases .
